examples.example: 无论你在哪里，都要保持乐观积极的心态。

translate.english: No matter where you are, always keep an optimistic and positive mindset.

examples.example: 无论我走到哪里，都能感受到生活的美好。

translate.english: No matter where I go, I can feel the beauty of life.

examples.example: 无论我未来走向哪里，我都会带着热情和勇气去面对。

translate.english: No matter where I go in the future, I will face it with enthusiasm and courage.
